boardgame.name: インザルーイン (In the Ruin)
boardgame.description:
～You are an explorer in search of a mysterious gem (crystal) hidden in ancient ruins.
Take on the challenge of these mysterious ruins, which take on a different form for each visitor.
The winner is the one who finds more gems, reveals more of the ruins, and makes it back alive. ～In The Ruins

In the Ruins is a new type of paper pen game where you move the pieces on the paper you fill out.

Like a dungeon PRG, you can draw your own dungeon map by filling in walls and passages on a grid.

By moving the explorer on the drawn map, various scoring elements are connected in a chain.

The winner's map with the most points looks the best! That's what this game is all about.

boardgame.name: Vierundfertig
boardgame.description:
Vierundfertig is based on the Connect 4 concept - the winner is the first player who manages to create a line of four cubes, either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
The board has a row of seven fields. The active player rolls a die, enters one of their pieces on any empty field and moves the number of steps rolled, either horizontically or vertically (climbing onto other pieces). In subsequent turns, players can choose between entering a new piece and moving a piece already on the board (provided no other piece stands on top of it). Towers that are seven pieces high are demolished and the pieces returned to their owners; if a player has no pieces left, the highest tower is taken down. First player to get 4 in a row is the winner.

boardgame.name: Code van Coppens
boardgame.description:
Exciting challenges and awesome stunts. That's how we know the Coppens brothers from TV. With Coppens Code they created special rooms full of scientific puzzles, tests and assignments that you have to complete.

Solve riddles and collect useful items to escape. Can you crack the Coppens Code? The time starts now ...

Coppens Code is a unique escape room game to play at home. Just like in a 'real' escape room, the replayability is limited.

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: シブヤ ストラグル (Shibuya Struggle)
boardgame.description:
Each turn you send workers on different locations. When they're all on the board, if there are multiple players on the same location, they fight (sum of dice rolling depending on their number of workers + cards effects + paid money + combat stat...)

The winner resolve the location (typically get cards, or increase your stats (income, workers, combat, luck)). Then players may claim one of the four bosses if they control two given areas (depending on the boss). They will help for the final fight.

When the four bosses have been claimed, the central tile become a location to fight KING. If you manage to beat him (he's like a super strong player), you win the game.

boardgame.name: Crimibox: Dossier Macdeath – Episode III
boardgame.description:
In the final episode of Macdeath, all the pieces of this gruesome investigation finally come together.

As you get closer than ever to Maarten's killer, one thing becomes more than clear to you: this monster cannot be caught just like that.

At least not without a final fight.

Some of the features included in this game:
- Analyse police documents
- Watch video footage
- Send e-mails to witnesses
- Search police databases
- Scour social media for clues

And much more!

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: キシィ (Kishii)
boardgame.description:
This is a game where you work together with your friends to escape from a city full of zombies!

In this game, you and your friends have a limited amount of time to escape from a city full of zombies caused by the ancient virus "Kishii".
There are many dangerous zombies in the city, and you have to explore the city to find the items you need to escape. In addition, the virus is spreading in the city, so you have to hurry or you will get infected too.
Even if you don't have strong weapons, work with your friends and you'll get everyone out!

Basic how to play :
Each player chooses a character.
Set all the cards face down in the middle of the table.
On each round :
- every player reveals a card from the center : take the items and leave the zombies in the middle of the table.
- each player may then exchange items, use their character's special skill or use items to defeat the zombies.
- when players are done with their actions, if there is one or more zombie remaining face up on the table, one of the players become a zombie (he now counts as a zombie and will attack other players on future turns)
If the players manage to get four special items (the map, radio, car and fuel) before the end of the 5th round, they escape the city and win the game. Their score then depends on the number of characters (NPC included) they could save.

ハラハラ・ドキドキ間違いなし！
仲間と協力しながら、皆でゾンビだらけの街から脱出するゲームです！
神経衰弱感覚で手軽に始められます。

大古の病原体「Kishii」によりゾンビだらけになった街から、限られた時間で仲間と協力しながら脱出するゲームです。
街にはたくさんの危険なゾンビ達がいますが、みなさんは街を探索して脱出に必要なアイテムを探さなければなりません。
さらに街には病原体が広がりつつあるので、急がないとあなたも感染してしまいます。
心配はいりません。「Kishii」のゾンビ達は、とても愛らしく働き者のゾンビばかりです。
強い武器はなくても、仲間と協力し合って皆で脱出しましょう！

boardgame.name: Crimibox: Dossier Rhetro Virus
boardgame.description:
In 1999 a professor was murdered. Howeve, his murder was never solved.

What happened all these years ago? What was the professor secretly investigating? What has it to do with the horror unfolding now? Your source tells you that this murder is just the beginning.

Can you act fast enough to stop the bloodshed? Or does this mystery also end in horror and death?

Some of the features included in this game:
- Analyze police files
- Watch video images
- Send emails to witnesses
- Search police databases
- Analyze samples

And much more!

-description from the publisher's website (translated)

boardgame.name: Battle of Komaki and Nagakute
小牧・長久手の戦い
boardgame.description:
A game with the theme of "Battle of Komaki and Nagakute", a battle between Hashiba Hideyoshi and the allied forces of Oda Nobukatsu and Tokugawa Ieyasu in Tensho 12 (1584).

This game does not include battles in the northern part of Ise, Kii, Izumi, and Settsu, and focuses on the battles in the Owari and Mino areas.

boardgame.name: Night Raid on Gongchangling
弓張嶺夜襲作戦
boardgame.description: Night Raid on Gongchangling is a game that reproduces the night attack operation by the Imperial Japanese Army's 2nd Division on 26 August 1904 during the Battle of Liaoyang. One player commands the Imperial Japanese Army (2nd Division) and the other player commands the Russian Army (mainly the 1st Brigade of the 9th Infantry Division).

boardgame.name: The Big Ticket
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Targos mourns as the city’s star goat-ball player turns up dead. The Zhentarim need answers: was it incidental? Or is something even more nefarious than them pulling the strings?

A two-to-four hour adventure for 5th to 10th level characters

This adventure occurs in Targos, one of the Ten‑Towns in Icewind Dale, and is based on the Goat‑ball! hook from the Dungeoncraft – Plague of Ancients program. It is also the third adventure of the Targos Ascending series. Only Season 10 characters may participate in this adventure if following Adventurers League rules.

This adventure comes with rules to Street Goat-ball, a fast-paced version of Goat-ball with quick passing and offensive focus.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Wailing Ice: Trouble and Turmoil in Termalaine
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Keenrunner, a Goliath Frost Druid, has been traversing Icewind Dale, awakening all manner of creatures and sending them to the nearest Ten-Town, Termalaine. This has caused discomfort and anger among the townsfolk. The town of Termalaine seeks assistance in this matter.

This is the first part of a series of adventures named Wailing Ice.

A Two-hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: The Voice Bringer
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Bryn Shander is full of tales of missing Gnomes and talking animals. What could be at the back of these rumours?

A four-hour Icewind Dale adventure for Level 1-4 characters. Optimized for average party level (APL) 2.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Library of Lost Books
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The Library of Lost Books normally only appears during an eclipse, but the events of Icewind Dale have summoned it to the icy waste. Lost knowledge beckons, but the late fees could be deadly!

A 2-4 hour, Tier 1 (APL 3) adventure for Season 10 of the Dungeons & Dragons Adventurer's League.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-PoA Dungeoncraft, Plague of Ancients Adventures

boardgame.name: Happy-Go-Lucky
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

An Eberron Salvage Mission playable as part of the Oracle of War campaign

A much-loved figure from Salvation has gone missing in the Mournland, apparently while searching for a massive hidden hoard. Is there still a chance to bring one (or possibly both) of them back? Or has luck finally run out?

A Three-hour Eberron Salvage Mission adventure for Tier 3 characters. Optimized for 13th level characters.
